url.title: URL
url.description: The URL of the WMTS server.

dataCustodian.title: Data custodian
dataCustodian.description: A description of the custodian of the data sources in this group.This property is an HTML string that must be sanitized before display to the user.

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.description: The additional parameters to pass to the WMTS server when requesting images.All parameter names must be entered in lowercase in order to be consistent with references in TerrisJS code.If this property is undefiend, WebMapTileServiceCatalogItem.defaultParameters is used.

blacklist.title: Blacklist
blacklist.description: A hash of names of blacklisted data layers.  A layer that appears in this hashwill not be shown to the user.  In this hash, the keys should be the Title of the layers to blacklist,and the values should be "true".

titleField.title: Title field
titleField.description: The field name to use as the primary title in the catalog view: each WMTS layer's"title" (default), "identifier", or "abstract".
